bullet emp.name: Bullet EMP
bullet emp.desc: destroys all bullets in it's radius

ult.name: Reset Stun
ult.desc: stuns enemies for a short time to reset their turrets, useful against spinners

stun emp.name: Stun EMP
stun emp.desc: stuns all enemies in the radius

ult.name: Stun bomb
ult.desc: deals moderate damage to invaders in the radius.

barrier.name: Barrier
barrier.desc: Erects a circular barrier that absorbs enemy fire

ult.name: Inner lining
ult.desc: Created a secondary barrier inside the primary one to absorb enemy fire inside the barrier

laser storm.name: Laser Storm
laser storm.desc: Releases Laser Moons for a short time that deal great damage

ult.name: Laser Moon Mk.II
ult.desc: Laser moons shoot two lasers,dealing extra damage

missile swarm.name: Missile swarm
missile swarm.desc: releases a volley of high-burst damage missiles

ult.name: Advanced targeting
ult.desc: Missiles will change targets if their current one is destroyed, only applies to targets that were inside the aura upon activation.

point defense.name: Point Defense
point defense.desc: destroys a small amount of bullets around the ship

ult.name: MIRV defense
ult.desc: MIRVs are easier to get rid of

chrono field.name: Chrono Field
chrono field.desc: phases your ship out for a limited time in a small radius

ult.name: Phase out
ult.desc: Phases the ship out for half a second when they exit the field

Vorpal lance.name: Vorpal lance
Vorpal lance.desc: Launches a piercing lance that deals considerable damage

phalanx.name: Phalanx
phalanx.desc: created a temporary shield in front of your ship

ult.name: Wide Phalanx
ult.desc: Makes the Phalanx wider and increases it's durability

ion cannon.name: Ion cannon
ion cannon.desc: launches a projectile that will stun whatever it hits

ult.name: EMP bomb
ult.desc: Deals moderate damage in a moderate radius

blade storm.name: Blade storm
blade storm.desc: Variant of Missile Swarm. deals less damage but requires much less energy to use

ult.name: Omnislash
ult.desc: Small buff to stats. Any special effect has yet to be determined.
